title: Trying so hard to make everything perfect

replies.body: So cool! {{champion:82}}
Mordekaiser numero uno! {{champion:82}}
You're not a true Morde main if you don't even own Dragon Knight Mordekaiser XD
Hail to the Dragon Knight master race
I joined when it was no longer available xD

mystery skin trade until you have it
or pray every night and day for at least one hour that they release it again. 

you pray to mordekaiser.
Or he could just wait for the annual unlocking of the vault when Riot want more money. It'll be available at least 1 day at half price as well.
Got to take eyes open then *_*
They'll announce it, you'll know exactly what day it is.
thanks for both the infos
I think they need to rename it to "Dragon King"
smite ignite would look better color wise though .... {{summoner:14}} {{summoner:11}}

Don't give me ideas!
My teammates already question my sanity for playing Morde.
Playing with Smite'n'ignite would send them over the edge D:
Not if you're jungler :3

Jungle Mord is my guilty pleasure.
Warwick levels of sustain with his W and great clearing.
Level 4 soloing drake and generally farming everything that isn't already dead.

Sadly jungle morde will be nerfed substantially next patch :'(
Waiting for the Dev Blog about it. They said last week that Statikk was writing one on the Kaiser.

Jep, anxious to see what they have to say.

Hopefully it'll be up today
Jungle Morde's going fine, I've been doing it on PBE still. The Q is stronger earlier, which makes up for most of healing loss on his w.
And song-wise. /album wise
Should run a bunch of programs in the background to get into yellow ping.
get the pings to match the 100% when it loads

https://i.imgur.com/G7mr8Mw.png

Yes, yes! From one main to another, revel in your vividly vile villainy vivaciously!
What have I done? Created beauty by simply rocking! That's all.
So this proves that the Board thumbnail system is a pervert. Heck, this topic's thumbnail was centered over Morde's abs. You could grind meat on those.

Wait Dragon Knight Morde...
Would he be teamed up with Trist and Lulu against the Slayers then?
But he kills the dragon to gain a ghost.
But technically he train the ghost of the dragon since the alive dragon wont listen to him
To be, your biggest success is that 39 ping T_T
dragon knight is still cool and all but he lost the orbiting doritos with the rework
That's.... Beautiful
WAIT. There is one way to make this even more perfect. YOur connection must be yellow, not green!!!
But then there is no reverse ping to %...
But the ping is.. nevermind
You remind me of myself when I pick my support skin to try and match my ADC.
That's so beautiful, so perfectly synced.
I wonder if they knew he was going to get a pet dragon back when Dragon Knight was being made

It was a homage to Dota's Dragon knight....
Now that I think of it the current Morde is a lot like Dota's DK.
Both are melee carries that have dragon forms to siege towers and frequent a duo lane
e_e
You da man.

I didn't think anyone else was going to try and do something like this! I only really wanted to get to mastery with Azir and Gold due to the color scheme! I do actually run these spells (Exhaust & Flash) as well as play most of my games with Emperor. 

http://www.mediafire.com/convkey/9e73/bmjbc26mdfsgjuszg.jpg

The dream
As a player who doesn't often play Morde, I only have Dragon Knight skin, and not much else to him

Hey Malicious! I redid the video I made two days ago about Mordekaiser buggs, it references you a bit less, but otherwise it's much better! [Here's the YouTube Link!](https://youtu.be/j3CfP9Ei_YI)

There's vomit in Riot's coding already, Morde's spaghetti.
No Pentakill Icon :O
too much red  and  gold for me
So I'm not the only one who's nitpicky about having my icon and skin match?

I sure as hell hope you own every single skin though.
If not you lost all your credibility as a Morde main :D
Only Morde skin I don't have :(
I prefer Pentakill Morde and smacking everyone with an electric guitar. But, Dragon Knight is also great skin, has some sweet W particles :)
